The 'content-digest' matching method is almost entirely untested as, until =
very recently, it hasn't been possible to record such duplicates in WARC fi=
les properly.

I expect I'll be looking into addressing that in the coming =
months, but for now it is only for those willing to put in some serious wor=
k.

- Kris
